content: I was thinking of getting a tuning kit, but now I'm not so sure. I've heard that a good set of tires can make a big difference too. Can you tell me more about the suspension upgrades? I've never really thought about that before, but if it can improve handling and stability, it might be worth considering. Also, I spent the whole Saturday before my last event at the mechanic's shop getting my brake pads replaced, so I'm a bit worried about the cost of these upgrades.
